key_features: Singapore's first-ever eco-friendly recycled card, made from 85.5% recycled plastic
Get 5% Cashback on Golden Village, McDonald’s, McDelivery, Netflix, Spotify and Starbucks
Get an additional 5% Green Cashback on selected Eco-Eateries, Retailers and Transport Services
Get 0.3% Cashback on All Other Spend

To apply, students must be a Singapore Citizen/Permanent Resident between 21 to 27 years old and enrolled in either NUS, NTU, SIM, SIT, SMU, SUSS, SUTD, Nanyang Polytechnic, Ngee Ann Polytechnic, Temasek Polytechnic, Singapore Polytechnic or Republic Polytechnic
Credit limit is capped at S$500 per calendar month

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.
petrol: Get 0.3% Cashback on All Other Spend
Enjoy up to 14% instant fuel savings at Esso
cash_back: Get 0.3% Cashback on All Other Spend
Get 5% Cashback on Golden Village, McDonald’s, McDelivery, Netflix, Spotify and Starbucks
Get an additional 5% Green Cashback on selected Eco-Eateries, Retailers and Transport Services

Cashback T&Cs: Cashback is capped at S$15 on eligible Sustainable Spend, S$15 on eligible Merchant Spend and S$20 on All Other Spend for each calendar month. Cashback is computed to the nearest 2 decimal places per transaction. Cashback will be awarded to the Principal Cardmember’s Card Account (that is of good standing) by the end of the following calendar month. Cashback awarded will be reflected in the monthly Card Account statement. Cashback will automatically be applied to pay part of the billed amount for that statement month.
